title: Metro: Last Light Redux 1.0 – First-person shooter game in post-apocalyptic Moscow
content: It is the year 2034. Beneath the ruins of post-apocalyptic Moscow, in the tunnels of the Metro, the remnants of mankind are besieged by deadly threats from outside – and within.
